casebody.data:
Vivian Shepard PEEL et al., Plaintiffs-Appellants, v. Catherine S. BANIAKAS et al., Defendants-Appellees. No. 71-3398

Summary Calendar.**

United States Court of Appeals, Fifth Circuit. June 7, 1972. Before BELL, DYER and CLARK, Circuit Judges.

Rule 18, 5 Cir.; see Isbell Enterprises, Inc. v. Citizens Casualty Company of New York et al., 5 Cir. 1970, 431 F.2d 409, Part I.

 PER CURIAM:

Affirmed. See Local Rule 21.1 The district court correctly held that title was established in defendants by the adverse possession of the United States. See Stanley v. Schwalby, 1893, 147 U.S. 508, 13 S.Ct. 418, 37 L.Ed. 259.

. See NLRB v. Amalgamated Clothing Workers of America, 5 Cir. 1970, 430 F.2d 966.
